00041 #define DEBUG_SUBSYSTEM S_LOV
00042 
00043 #include "lov_cl_internal.h"
00044 
00049 /*****************************************************************************
00050  *
00051  * Lov-sub device and device type functions.
00052  *
00053  */
00054 
00055 static int lovsub_device_init(const struct lu_env *env, struct lu_device *d,
00056                               const char *name, struct lu_device *next)
00057 {
00058         struct lovsub_device  *lsd = lu2lovsub_dev(d);
00059         struct lu_device_type *ldt;
00060         int rc;
00061 
00062         ENTRY;
00063         next->ld_site = d->ld_site;
00064         ldt = next->ld_type;
00065         LASSERT(ldt != NULL);
00066         rc = ldt->ldt_ops->ldto_device_init(env, next, ldt->ldt_name, NULL);
00067         if (rc) {
00068                 next->ld_site = NULL;
00069                 RETURN(rc);
00070         }
00071 
00072         lu_device_get(next);
00073         lu_ref_add(&next->ld_reference, "lu-stack", &lu_site_init);
00074         lsd->acid_next = lu2cl_dev(next);
00075         RETURN(rc);
00076 }
00077 
00078 static struct lu_device *lovsub_device_fini(const struct lu_env *env,
00079                                             struct lu_device *d)
00080 {
00081         struct lu_device *next;
00082         struct lovsub_device *lsd;
00083 
00084         ENTRY;
00085         lsd = lu2lovsub_dev(d);
00086         next = cl2lu_dev(lsd->acid_next);
00087         lsd->acid_super = NULL;
00088         lsd->acid_next = NULL;
00089         RETURN(next);
00090 }
00091 
00092 static struct lu_device *lovsub_device_free(const struct lu_env *env,
00093                                             struct lu_device *d)
00094 {
00095         struct lovsub_device *lsd  = lu2lovsub_dev(d);
00096         struct lu_device     *next = cl2lu_dev(lsd->acid_next);
00097 
00098         if (atomic_read(&d->ld_ref) && d->ld_site) {
00099                 LIBCFS_DEBUG_MSG_DATA_DECL(msgdata, D_ERROR, NULL);
00100                 lu_site_print(env, d->ld_site, &msgdata, lu_cdebug_printer);
00101         }
00102         cl_device_fini(lu2cl_dev(d));
00103         OBD_FREE_PTR(lsd);
00104         return next;
00105 }
00106 
00107 static const struct lu_device_operations lovsub_lu_ops = {
00108         .ldo_object_alloc      = lovsub_object_alloc,
00109         .ldo_process_config    = NULL,
00110         .ldo_recovery_complete = NULL
00111 };
00112 
00113 static struct lu_device *lovsub_device_alloc(const struct lu_env *env,
00114                                              struct lu_device_type *t,
00115                                              struct lustre_cfg *cfg)
00116 {
00117         struct lu_device     *d;
00118         struct lovsub_device *lsd;
00119 
00120         OBD_ALLOC_PTR(lsd);
00121         if (lsd != NULL) {
00122                 int result;
00123 
00124                 result = cl_device_init(&lsd->acid_cl, t);
00125                 if (result == 0) {
00126                         d = lovsub2lu_dev(lsd);
00127                         d->ld_ops         = &lovsub_lu_ops;
00128                 } else
00129                         d = ERR_PTR(result);
00130         } else
00131                 d = ERR_PTR(-ENOMEM);
00132         return d;
00133 }
00134 
00135 static const struct lu_device_type_operations lovsub_device_type_ops = {
00136         .ldto_device_alloc = lovsub_device_alloc,
00137         .ldto_device_free  = lovsub_device_free,
00138 
00139         .ldto_device_init    = lovsub_device_init,
00140         .ldto_device_fini    = lovsub_device_fini
00141 };
00142 
00143 #define LUSTRE_LOVSUB_NAME         "lovsub"
00144 
00145 struct lu_device_type lovsub_device_type = {
00146         .ldt_tags     = LU_DEVICE_CL,
00147         .ldt_name     = LUSTRE_LOVSUB_NAME,
00148         .ldt_ops      = &lovsub_device_type_ops,
00149         .ldt_ctx_tags = LCT_CL_THREAD
00150 };
